title: Iteration Diary Entry
description: Schema for iteration diary entries in logs/iterations.jsonl - tracks Ralph iteration outcomes for status reporting and calibration

subtaskId.description: ID of the subtask this iteration worked on (e.g., 'SUB-001')

sessionId.description: Claude Code session ID. Maps to ~/.claude/projects/<path>/<session-id>.jsonl for log analysis

status.description: Outcome of this iteration: completed (success), failed (gave up), retrying (will retry)

summary.description: Brief summary of what happened in this iteration

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this iteration completed

milestone.description: Name of the milestone this subtask belongs to

iterationNum.description: Which iteration attempt this was (1 = first try)

keyFindings.description: Key findings or insights from this iteration

errors.description: Error messages encountered during this iteration

toolCalls.description: Number of tool calls made during this iteration

filesChanged.description: List of files modified during this iteration

duration.description: Duration of the iteration in seconds

costUsd.description: Total cost in USD for this iteration
